column4: hey, does anyone have the time to help me with installing ubuntu? i've got a problem
when i try to install when i boot the screen is all messed up
no
oh whoops
what seems to be the trouble?
when i boot the screen is all stretched and distorted
i cant make anything out
ctrl-alt-f1 will take you to a console
try sudo dpkt-reconfigure xserver-xorg
and this will fix the screen when im tring to install?
when you boot with the installer?
yeah, this is my first time installing
im a complete noob
hmm i don't know about that sry.. i thought you finished the install...
nah, my screen for the install part is just crazy :\, do you think it could be because i burned the cd myself?
i don't know much about the installers, i used it once and was done with it...
oh ok, thanks for trying to help
i doubt it...
thanks, id really appreciate that
sry i couldn't find info on that for you
i have a wireless card for my laptop, it's not showing up or working on ubuntu
i dont know how to install drivers on linux :\
it is a royal pita
is your card supported?
